channel.title: Hi, need help with barrows gloves [PI]
channel.description: Hello i need help with barrows gloves i want them noted to put them into my server but i dont know the code please help meh :P

item.title: Hi, need help with barrows gloves [PI]
item.dc:creator: @yo_dude_1345 yo dude 1345
item.description:
@yo_dude_1345 wrote:

ok you say you have a pi server. Take your barrows gloves and follow these instructions verry carefully!

1.) note them in the bank.
2.) now take those noted gloves and click use on them and then click on a npc.
3.) now switch to the cmd that is running the server and it should say something along the lines of, players (1) used item id#### with npc id #### the item id then is the item id for the noted gloves. Also did the last code I posted for you work :D? just tell me cuess I wanna know. you can keep your money it’s fine cuess help is free and I’d just like a confirmation that the code did work. Cuess right now it’s bothering me cuess I don’t know if the code worked =’[.

Read full topic
item.source: Hi, need help with barrows gloves [PI]
